name: Demoman
description: Start with C4, Shotgun and Hailstorm MGL

name: Throwing Arm II
description: Throw distance of a C4 increased by 25%

name: Hole Punch II
description: A 50% range increase for pistols and secondary SMGs

name: Throwing arm
description: Throw distance of a C4 increased by 50%

name: Here Kitty
description: C4 will attract zombies for 5 seconds after being planted but can kill 35% less targets (base: 14)

name: Not Today
description: You may become incapacitated 1 additional time before dying

name: The perfect composition
description: The explosion radius of C4 and Claymores is increased by 25%

name: Welcome Mat
description: Upon trigger Claymores will attract zombies for 3 seconds before explosion. Start with Claymores

name: Green Fingered
description: Planting speed of Claymores is increased by 50%. 25% chance to plant the Claymore at no cost to your equipment. Start with Claymores

name: Welcoming Committee
description: Any mortar used by you or teammates can kill 25% more targets (base: 40)

name: Impact grenades
description: Projectiles fired from the Hailstorm MGL explode upon contact

name: Unshakeable
description: Self-inflicted explosive damage reduced by 100%

name: Directed Blast
description: You deal 100% more damage to zombies with all explosives

name: Nimble Thumbs
description: All shotguns' reload speed increased by 50%

name: You've worn me out
description: Killing enemies with equipment restores 2 grenades for the Hailstorm MGL

name: Demolition Squad
description: Explosive equipment can kill 25% more targets. Applies for the whole team

name: Sleight of Hand
description: Switch weapons 25% faster

name: Blink of an eye
description: The reload speed of secondary weapons is increased by 15%

name: Bounty Hunter
description: Deal 25% more damage to special zombies

name: Wheatgrass
description: Health increased by 25%

name: Walk Softly
description: Start with a S890 shotgun

name: Smells like gunpowder
description: All Hailstorm MGLs within 10 meters will be automatically marked if you don't have a heavy weapon

name: Tooled Up
description: Increase Claymore capacity to 4 and C4 capacity to 3

name: Pickpocket
description: Killing 15 zombies in rapid succession refills one equipment charge (cooldown 60 seconds)

name: Iâ€™ll Take That
description: Killing a special zombie restores one equipment charge (cooldown 60 seconds)

name: Shrapnel
description: All your explosives can kill 10% more targets

name: Free Refill I
description: Restores 1% of primary weapon ammo for each kill made with equipment

name: Free Refill II
description: Each kill made with equipment restores 1 round to your primary weapon magazine

name: Third Hand
description: Killing 15 zombies in rapid succession instantly reloads your primary weapon

name: Free Refill III
description: There is a chance that killing a special zombie will cause it to drop a Hailstorm MGL (cooldown: 180 seconds)

name: Hollywood
description: Explosive and fire damage dealt to yourself and your teammates reduced by 30%

name: Directed Blast II
description: Your explosives can kill 10% more targets

name: Knock Knock II
description: 10% chance of using a Breaching Charge without spending it

name: Scorched Earth
description: Claymore and C4 explosions will set the nearby area on fire

name: Deep Pockets
description: Carried ammo capacity for heavy weapon increased by 35%

name: Hole Punch
description: Shotgun range increased by 50%

name: Alert red!
description: C4 explosions also release a gas cloud that hurts zombies

name: Senjata
description: Start with a Senjata PDW in your secondary weapon slot

name: Thumper
description: Start with a Thumper GL in your secondary weapon slot

name: Heavy Rain
description: Start with improved Hailstorm MGL that does 50% more damage, and has 50% more ammo. All Hailstorm MGL pickups for you also improved [base: 8 ammo]

name: Ride of the Valkyries
description: Start with an improved Multi-shot Rocket Launcher that kills 50% more zombies. All MRL202 Commando pickups for you are also improved [base: 4 ammo]

name: Knock Knock
description: Start with a Breaching Charge

name: Job Satisfaction
description: Killing 15 zombies in rapid succession grants a temporary health boost

name: Predator
description: Killing special zombies boosts firearm damage by 50% for 10 seconds

name: All around is ashes
description: The Thumper GL deals 25% increased damage

name: Technician
description: C4, Claymore Landmines and MGL can kill 25% more targets

name: Thumper II
description: Carried ammo capacity for Thumper GL increased by 1

name: Directed Blast III
description: Your explosives can kill 5% more targets
